CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:cdr = "cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr" version = "1.0" exclude-result-prefixes = "cdr">
<xsl:output method = "xml" omit-xml-declaration = "yes" />
<xsl:template match = "/"> <xsl:apply-templates select = "TermSet"/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match = "TermSet"> <xsl:variable name = "members"> <xsl:call-template name = "getMembers"/> </xsl:variable> <TermSet> <Name> <xsl:value-of select = "TermSetName"/> </Name> <Members> <xsl:value-of select = "normalize-space($members)"/> </Members> </TermSet> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template name = "getMembers"> <xsl:for-each select = "TermSetMember"> <xsl:value-of select = "concat(@cdr:ref, ' ')"/> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template>
</xsl:transform>
